snippet: A man dressed as an Afghan police officer shot and killed three American soldiers, an Afghan official said Friday, a day on which a total of eight American and British soldiers were killed in Afghanistan.
abstract: Man dressed as an Afghan police officer shoots and kills three American soldiers, among a total of eight American and British soldiers killed in Afghanistan over a two-day period.

byline.contributor: An Afghan employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Lashkar Gah, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: A man dressed as an Afghan police officer shot and killed three American soldiers, an Afghan official said Friday, a day on which a total of eight American and British soldiers were killed in Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Attacker in Afghan Uniform Kills 3 U.S. Soldiers
headline.main: Afghan Ally Kills 3 G.I.’s, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Afghan Ally Kills 3 G.I.’s, Official Says

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
